title: Sustom

content: Selling Cloud Accounts    Google 300$ for 80+ day / 24$    Linode balance 100$ / 10$    Hetzner / 6$    Digital Ocean 10 limit / 9$    Oracle / 10$    Kamatera Cloud / 7$    Azure 200$ free trial / 6 $    Alibaba cloud / 8$Contact Details :Telegram - @stopato

comments.body: take care with this guy, when i ask him to give a screenshoot or a video for the account he said he sell he couldn't provide it. it might be a scammer, use escrow only with himhe message me first that he sell oracle here is chat after 2 days he come and said i'm scammer on telegramCode:A Bond1 November 202219:22A BondHi. Ur price for oracle accs?2 November 202201:39jean dumahi. tell me you price between 15 usd and 22?01:41if you really can make it make frankfurt area01:41and once is ready make a video 30 seconds to see that you on account and the time on pc or on google time now17:08jean dumahi17:08can make or?4 November 202211:46A BondNot for u11:46Scammer23:50jean dumawho scammer, you which not reply , you are the only scammer here23:50show me where i scam idiot?take care with him he change his telegram id often https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5418507.msg61193812#msg61193812here was another id Quote from: Sustom on October 27, 2022, 01:39:23 PMHi your PM closedWrite me your telegram or write me @graharmonCan sell qiwi or yoomoneyarchive for reference https://archive.ph/2IEaMif they scam too many people and the amount is big enough there might come a court decision so you admins of bitcointalk forum to give all his logins to legal authorities for further processing.
